item.description:
Hello all:
Hope you had a wonderful summer! Now that cooler weather has driven us indoors from the deck, pool, or patio, you may be noticing...CLUTTER!

I use The Law of Attraction every day in everything I do. If it's new to you - know that everything and everyone vibrates energy. The energy you send out attracts similar energy, and manifests people and opportunities in your life. I pretty much live in a state of extreme optimism, and I have AMAZING experiences every day!

Clutter not only diffuses and distracts your energy from being focused on the things you really want in your life; it also attracts more clutter.

Come learn how to use The Law of Attraction principles to get rid of clutter forever. It's fast, it's easy - you won't believe you never thought of it before!

Hope to see you there!

Marilyn

PS: The location will either be Newton Center or right off 128 in Waltham. wanted to get the date & details out to you ASAP... location will be confirmed later.

group.name: Tools for Decluttering, Personal Change & Goal Attainment

item.name: Clear Clutter using The Law of Attraction
